author: Julian Shen-Berro
title: How to help struggling Asian American communities amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Asian American businesses saw drops in customers as high as 80 percent long before the U.S. isolation rules, as stigma surrounding the virus kept customers out of local Chinatowns.
content: As stay-home orders have arisen quickly across the country in an attempt to curb the spread of the coronavirus, local restaurants and businesses have seen drastically reduced customer traffic and plummeting profits. But perhaps few have been as greatly affect… [+6507 chars]
